title: shuddha svarUpam
sahitya:
shuddha svarUpam aduvE ellArkkum sundaramAna poduvE manamE


anupallavi

  shakti sadAshiva viSNu brahmAvenrAlum tandai allA yahOvA ahUran enrAlum


caraNam    peyar vaDivAghiya bhAedam kaDandadu pEccilum mUccilum piDipaDA onradu
uyar mati dhyAnattAl uLLArak-kANbadu Om tat sat Om enra mantiram pUNbadu
